projects: >Offers business certificates and diplomas. All online. All nationally accredited. Open Training Institute was the brainchild of OUA, Australia’s leader in online learning.

Personal Contributions

  • 2015 Site redesign implementation
  • Mobile-first responsive frontend
  • Blog
  • Social media sharing

Began working on this project in 2013. Responsible for building the bulk of the front end styling as well features such as the

>Blog, allowing posts to authored, categorised and shared by readers on social media.

Continued working on this in 2015 when a new theme was developed using Bootstrap framework. Responsible for porting in a new theme to be in use concurrently with the old theme. The redesigned header, footer and homepage is currently live in production.

>With production studios in 22 territories and 11 regional offices, engaging 1,700 people, plus many more working on contracts on various productions, is challenging. The launch of four new values – confident, creative, collaborative and commercial – which underpin the business’s global success, prompted a review of existing internal communication channels, including the Intranet and the existing pdf-format quarterly magazine, Connectmag.

>This was built using Flash Actionscript 3.0 which I had to pick up and learn while developing this project. User tracking analytics show us that the average reader is spending more than 13 minutes reading the magazine and that there are on average 8,330 page visits – a far higher readership than the pdf version was achieving. Connectmag is a double award winner in the UK and Europe, recently winning Europe’s ‘Best electronic publication’ title, and the IoIC’s Gold Award for Best Digital Media.

With production studios in 22 territories and 11 regional offices, engaging 1,700 people, plus many more working on contracts on various productions, is challenging. >Foosle aims to offer a salve to recruiting pain points by offering employers, recruiters and candidates a superior alternative to existing job sites and social media search channels.

This was built in a Java/Oracle environment. Responsibilities included front-end template coding, jQuery UI development, google maps integration(V3 API) and video chat integration.

Foosle aims to offer a salve to recruiting pain points by offering employers, recruiters and candidates a superior alternative to existing job sites and social media search channels. This was built in a Java/Oracle environment. Responsibilities included front-end template coding, jQuery UI development, google maps integration(V3 API) and video chat integration.
